with tor restoration ministries websites
wws spirit and tour comm it is the 6th
night now of Chanukah that's beginning
tonight December the 21st 2014 heading
into the sixth day of Hanukkah and I
just I wanted just to talk real briefly
that there's a movement in the in the
Messianic circles at least some of the
Messianic circles where people in the
Hebrew roots and Messier movements are
saying that you know we shouldn't keep
Hanukkah because it's not one of the
seven feasts that's in Leviticus 23 and
it was sort of added in by the Jews and
it's a very Jewish feast and doesn't
have anything to do with the Torah per
se and and you know there's a lot of a
lot of different people who are saying
that and I just want to say that that's
that's completely wrong first of all we
know Hanukkah is a biblical feast
because Yahshua observed Hanukkah we can
see that very clearly in John 10:22 I
mean Yasha went right up not only to
Jerusalem but right up to the temple to
teach and to contend with the Pharisees
and he wouldn't have gone up there where
you know basically that would have been
the nerve center of all the celebrations
and festivities for Chanukah for the
feast of dedication he wouldn't have
gone up there and associated himself
with that celebration if he didn't think
we as believers in yah should keep that
feast so so definitely it is definitely
a feast to be kept yes it was instituted
you know between the end of the writing
of the snoc and the beginning of the
renewed covenant but it's a historical
thing that happened as recorded in first
and second Maccabees it's definitely an
awesome victory given to the Jews who
devoted themselves to jaan the Torah and
yah gave them you know amazing victory
over this incredibly powerful Greek
Empire and the fact that Yahshua kept
this feast and taught at the temple
specifically on this feast and that the
Apostle John specifically notes that
it's the feasts of dedication Hanukkah
that Yahshua is teaching I mean all of
those facts just point
toward the importance of this feast and
yes there are some pagan elements that
have seeped into this feast in
modern-day judaism but you know again as
i think i mentioned on the first night
of Chanukah you can remove those pagan
elements and come back to the purity of
Chanukah and keep it in the way it's
supposed to be kept it is a feast of
dedication of rededicating your heart to
yah a feast of cleansing and purity and
getting pure before yah staying pure
before ya cleansing out your temples and
it's a it's a joyous feast it's a time
to you know buy good food and sing and
dance and be with your friends and
family and you know it's a time of great
joy and celebration it's a it's a second
Sukkot as I talked about last night so I
firmly reject all messianic sore Hebrew
roots people who say that we should not
keep Chanukah I think Chanukah is just
as important as the seven major feasts
in Leviticus 23 just as important as
Passover or Sukkot and I believe
Hanukkah will have a prophetic
significance just like Apostle Paul
Sowell talks about in Colossians 2 that
these feasts are shadows of things to
come I think he's also referring to
Chanukah the feasts of dedication that
this feast will have a future
fulfillment and specifically I believe
that the temple that Yahshua builds and
will be administrating over ruling over
in the Millennial Kingdom I believe that
that temple will be dedicated on the
first very first Hanukkah of the 1,000
year reign of the Millennial Kingdom I
believe that very strongly I think
that's one way Chanukah is going to be
used prophetically in the end times
so please celebrate this festival it's
it's it's it's it's it's what we're
supposed to be doing Christmas is a
counterfeit of Hanukkah Hanukkah is what
Yahshua wants his people to be doing
this is Daniel John Lee with tor
restorations ministries wishing everyone
a very happy sixth day of Hanukkah and
season of joy Shalom
